teamId: team Id ref TeamMaster - ObjectId - Optional
gameId: game Id ref GameEventDetails - ObjectId - Optional
createdBy: Playbook created by user Id - ObjectId
updatedBy: Playbook updated by user Id - ObjectId
useJerseyNumbers: boolean field to use jersey number or not - boolean

paths.drawer: user id - incase of tomorrow/future we want to have user based paths - string

size.width: the width of drawer's canvas - number
size.height: the height of drawer's canvas - number

players.id: should be used as unique identifier - number
players.title: player title or jersey number - string
